participant_1.name: Jake Thompson
participant_1.personality: Outgoing and hardworking, with a passion for life and a love for adventure.
participant_1.background: i've been working since i was sixteen years old. i'm a construction worker. my favorite food is mexican food. my favorite band is aerosmith. in my free time i like to watch nascar racing and ufc.

participant_2.background: i'm an omnivore. i am expecting twins in two months. i work at a bank. i just bought my first home. a already have a children.
